channel.title: Crashing after a few seconds on any map
channel.description: This crash is really strange. The game crashes after a few seconds whenever I load any map. The first time it crashed, I was on the second FAF map so I thought that was normal. However, when I loaded AM, it crashed after a few seconds. I don't think its a problem related to specs because I was able to play any map before almost crash-free. EDIT: I fixed my problem. I think it somehow may have been related to some launch options I used for HL2.
